author: Scott Manley
description:
Two big piece of Boom news this week, neither are particularly relevant to Overture, but, you can now fly the XB-1 in Microsoft Flight Simulator and it's a wonderfully detailed model. And they announced a gas turbine power projected named 'Superpower' which got them some more investment and could provide customers for their Symphony jet engine.
https://boomsupersonic.com/superpower

Follow me on Twitter for more updates:
https://twitter.com/DJSnM

I have a discord server where I regularly turn up:
https://discord.gg/zStmKbM

If you really like what I do you can support me directly through Patreon
https://www.patreon.com/scottmanley
title: Boom's XB-1 Comes To Flight Sims, Also Boom  Sells Jet Engines For Datacenters.
